description.p: Compute the sum of the expression over all rows.
Returns the sum of the expression over all rows.

discussion.p: The Sum function computes the sum of the expression over all rows.

example.caption: Sum() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT Sum(Order_Details.UnitPrice * Order_Details.Quantity) AS TotalPreDiscount FROM [Order Details] Order_Details =1354458.59
